scenario:
Questex's Vibe Conference announced the winners of the 2025 Vista Awards, recognizing top performers in the beverage industry. The awards were given to venues with innovative programs and contributions to the industry. 

The winners include:

- Best Overall: Cruise Line - Princess Cruises, Hotel - Marriott International, Multi-Unit Chain Restaurant - Applebee's Neighborhood Grill & Bar
- Best Spirits Program - Delta Sky Club
- Best Wine Program - Seasons 52
- Best Beer Program - BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse
- Best Adult Alcohol-Free Beverage Program - Hyatt Lifestyle
- Best Beverage Limited Time Offer - Delaware North
- Best Beverage Menu - Marella Cruises & The Apollo Group
- Best Overhaul of Beverage Program - Hyatt Hotels

The winners were chosen based on positive beverage sales initiatives, operational innovations, and training and service programs that uphold high-quality standards. A panel of judges from Johnson & Wales University and the RI Hospitality Association evaluated the entries.

Vibe Conference is the premier on-premise beverage conference for executives, held annually at the Town & Country Resort in San Diego, CA. The 2026 conference will be held from February 23-25, 2026.

Questex, the organizer of Vibe Conference, helps people live better and longer by bringing people together in various markets, including hospitality and wellness, life science and healthcare, and technologies that enable new experiences.
